content_pages.title: About Us
content_pages.summary: PNH Agro produces pure, cold-pressed oils using traditional wooden ghani methods to preserve natural taste and nutrition. We are committed to quality, honesty, and delivering wholesome agricultural products you can trust.
content_pages.content_md:
**Welcome to PNH Agro**

PNH Agro is committed to delivering high-quality, natural agricultural products with a strong focus on purity, nutrition, and traditional values. We specialize in **cold-pressed oils produced using the traditional wooden ghani method**, ensuring that the natural taste, aroma, and nutrients remain intact.

## What We Do

At PNH Agro, we blend time-honored extraction techniques with modern quality practices. Our oils are carefully produced to preserve their original goodness from seed to bottle. We believe in:

- **Traditional wooden ghani processing** to protect natural nutrients  
- **Pure and unrefined products** with no chemicals or preservatives  
- **Customer-focused service** with simple and direct ordering

## Why Choose Us

- Authentic cold-pressed oils with rich flavor and health benefits  
- Locally produced products that support regional agriculture  
- Honest, reliable, and responsive customer service

## Contact Us

ЁЯУН **Location:** Romena Afaz Road, Jaleshwaritala, Bogura, Bangladesh

Thank you for choosing PNH Agro тАФ where tradition meets trust.
